   By Rachel Tiede October 18, 2016

Clinton correct Buffett claimed to pay a lower tax rate than his secretary

   During the second presidential debate, Hillary Clinton argued against tax
   rules that allow the ultra-rich to pay lower rates than the middle class.

Urging major tax changes, Buffett has repeatedly said he pays a lower tax
   rate than his secretary and other employees.
